content: Armor and Gear form the core of your defence in Black Myth: Wukong. The defense buffs and extra buffs are vital for suvival as you progress through the game's chapters in our Walkthrough. Armor and Gear sets also come with set bonuses that are unlocked upon equipping several pieces of gear within the same set.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Armor_and_Gear.md', within the main section titled 'Armor and Gear'.
The content is as follows:
Armor and Gear form the core of your defence in Black Myth: Wukong. The defense buffs and extra buffs are vital for suvival as you progress through the game's chapters in our Walkthrough. Armor and Gear sets also come with set bonuses that are unlocked upon equipping several pieces of gear within the same set.
